transcripts.text: Hello.  Hello.  I think it's absolutely horrific that you can't hold a protest or a demonstration of any kind in this country without the kind of violence that is displayed here today.  It's absolutely disgusting and it's far for the course from the type of people who are involved over there.
March straight up to the barriers, try to get through the barriers, break through the barriers.  And we managed to push them back completely unprovoked, trying to attack women and children.

It's great to see such a massive crowd of communists out here today to support the Fianna Fáil Fine Gael coalition.  We should focus on the vulnerable people, the elderly.  These are the people who can be affected by this and let normal, healthy people get on with their lives.

In a pandemic, you wouldn't need to have to put out figures on RT every night.  You wouldn't need press conferences to tell people there was a pandemic going on.  People would be literally dying in the streets.  They're not.  They're not.  And because they're being lied to by Neffet, By the government and extraordinarily by the opposition or the so-called opposition that exists in the house over there.
I don't want anything to do with this new normal folks.  And you know what?  The old normal was far from ideal as well.

It's a national issue.  It's an issue of life and death.  But more, it's an issue of life and death for the nation.  whether we can allow ourselves to accept the destruction of our republic before our very eyes and say nothing.
